p: The databases of this research included Academic Search Premier, PubMed, ProQuest, Science Direct, and Google Scholar. An extensive search was performed from various governmental websites including the World Health Organization (WHO) and Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). The keywords used for the search included the following: “coronavirus” OR “pandemic” OR “pathogenesis” OR “SARS-CoV-2” AND “CoVID-19” OR “human transmission” OR “pharmacological” AND “nonpharmacological” OR “clinical characteristics” AND “the U.S.” AND “rural healthcare”. The articles were retrieved from our search and further distinguished for relevancy.
